events.message: The customer reported a car collision that occurred yesterday afternoon at a busy intersection in downtown.
The claim was reviewed and categorized under Auto Accident due to the involvement of a vehicle collision.
An insurance agent has been assigned to the claim to guide the customer through the process and gather necessary details.
The claim has been acknowledged and the customer was notified that the investigation will commence shortly.
The agent requested photos of the damaged vehicle, police report, and driver's license for further processing.
The customer successfully submitted all required documents including vehicle pictures and official accident report.
The investigation team has started reviewing submitted proof and contacting witnesses to verify accident details.
The investigation concluded confirming the customer's vehicle damage was caused by the other party in a collision.
A settlement amount was proposed to cover the repair costs and minor medical expenses incurred by the customer.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and appreciated the clear communication throughout.
The claim was officially approved by the claims department after validating all documentation and investigation results.
The settlement payment was issued to the customer's bank account to cover vehicle repairs and related expenses.
The claim was closed successfully after confirming the customer received payment and completed the repair process.
The claim file was archived into the records system for future reference and compliance purposes.
